DOC.brief_title: Prolonged Adjuvant Temozolomide v `` Stop & Go '' Glioblastoma Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients histologically confirm diagnosis GBM 2 . Availability pretreatment GBM tissue determine activation status MGMT gene mandatory strongly recommend 3 . Patients must receive radiation TMZ 6 week follow 6 month TMZ . Randomization perform within 6 week last chemotherapy . 4 . A brain MRI without PETScanmethionine must perform enrolment . 5 . Age ≥ 18 year 6 . Karnofsky Performance status ≥ 60 7 . Normal haematological function : ANC ≥ 1.5 x 109cells/l , platelet ≥ 100 x 109 cells/l 8 . Normal liver function : total bilirubin < 1.5 x ULN , alkaline phosphatase transaminase ( ASAT/ALAT ) < 2.5 time upper limit normal range 9 . Serum creatinine < 1.5 x ULN 10 . Clinically normal cardiac function without history ischemic heart disease past 12 month . Absence cardiac insufficiency NYHA grade III IV , instable angina , arrhythmia 11 . No previous current malignancy ( except treat basal squamous cell skin carcinoma , cervix cancer situ carcinoma breast ) . 12 . All patient ( male female ) reproductive potential must use effective contraception . Females must negative serum pregnancy test entry study . 13 . Signed informed consent patient legal representative must obtain . All non inclusion criterion
